reference.shortdesc: The mapref element is a convenience element that is equivalent to a topicref element with the format attribute set to "ditamap".

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: The hierarchy of the referenced map is merged into the container map at the position of the reference, and the relationship tables of the child map are added to the parent map.

sectiondiv.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , (with narrowed definitions of href and format, given below), , , , keyref, and keys.

fig.title: Sample document lib.ditamap that is reusable in other locations
Map that reuses lib.ditamap
fig.codeblock: <map id="standardlib"> <topichead navtitle="Developing with standard libraries"> <mapref href="lib.ditamap"/> </topichead> <!-- ... --> </map>
